Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: wafflman
Reviews.Content: We've browsed a lot of hotels during our trip to Miami and we chose this hotel because it offers a complimentary shuttle service to and from the aiport and anywhere within a five mile radius from the hotel. When we arrive at the airport, I called up the hotel and ask for a shuttle service. We waited at least 30 to 35 minutes. The driver was nice though. When we arrive at the hotel, we checked in, and it was a breeze. The check in time was not until 3 pm so we left our bags and went to the mall which is like a 10-minute drive from the hotel. We used the shuttle again to drive back to the hotel, no problem. Back at the hotel, when we were already in our room, we noticed that the AC was not cooling the room so we requested a different room. We were transferred by the receptionist right away. When were already settled, I noticed that there was an exhaust vent in the toilet/bathroom but it wasn't working at all. So you just need to open the windows or turn the ac full blast after you do your thing in the toilet, if you know what I mean. That was kind of a turn off for me but it wasn't that bad. But anyway, the room was clean, and beds were soft and I had a very good night sleep. There was free internet and cable by the way, so that's a plus. My most favorite part was the free breakfast. I did not expect it would be that good. You have a lot of choices, cereals, muffins, bread, fruits, eggs, bacon (they have different meats everyday), and best of all, the waffles, the best! I loved it so much that I actually bought a waffle maker when I went home. They have a variety of great coffees as well in their coffee area which is available 24 hours a day. Overall, the hotel was great. The hotel personnel that we've met were all nice. The breakfast lady always greets you with a big smile. And although the shuttle service was a bit busy all the time (thus the waiting time), the drivers have no problem picking you up even at 10 or 11 pm anywhere within the radius (with that I meant the mall), with all smiles. I would definitely stayed there again and I will have no problem recommending the hotel to my friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay !!”
Reviews.Author: healinghart
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a three day stay at this Hotel and I have nothing but great things to say. Check in was smooth, and front desk staff were very friendly. The lobby area was well kept as were other areas of the hotel. The room itself was very very clean and modern with daily room service. The bed was super comfy !!! Parking, WIFI and breakfast are free. The hotel is located very close to the highway and there are many options for food. There is also a pool, a small business center and a bar. The hotel also offers shuttle service to the airport and Mall though I didnt use it . Great Service, Great Value !!

Reviews.Title: “No costumer care”
Reviews.Author: Luiz_Ferreira
Reviews.Content: We were there only for one night last weekend (2/24/12 - 2/25/12). First, the good things about the hotel - It's close to the airport and it has free shuttles to/from MIA - Rooms are spacious - Free light breakfast - We arrived at the hotel at 1pm and they checked us in to one of oure 3 rooms so we could store our luggage Unfortunately, when we were about to check out, my mother slipped on wet florr in front of the elevators. There was no sign for peopleo coming out of the elevator, only for people who was going to take it. NO ONE FROM THE HOTEL GAVE ANY ASSISTANCE. It was like the didn't even care about it. My wife asked for a bag full of ice and it took almost 2 minutes for the lady on front desk to find a bag. As a result, my mother had to fly back to Brazil (9-hour flight) with a fractured wrist. So, if you stay at this hotel, make sure you don't suffer an accident, since they hotel staff won't give you any assistance.

Reviews.Title: “Shuttle service needs serious reevaluation”
Reviews.Author: Christidis
Reviews.Content: First off, besides the shuttle service... the hotel was wonderful. Really soft comfy bed, rooms seemed new and well decorated, just very comfortable and cozy feling all around. The breakfast is amazing: sausage patties, two different types of eggs, freshly made waffles, toast, cereals, fresh hot oatmeal, bagels, pastries, and different coffees available 24 hrs a day with different flavors. Loved it! Complimentary internet in the lobby as well. However, all of these good things were not the reason I decided to book this hotel. I wanted to utilize the shuttle service to and from the airport for a long layover I had, plus to and from the Dolphin Mall. I even contacted the hotel prior so I had the number to call when I arrived, which I did, but it was an hour and a half wait. Numerous other Hampton Inn shuttles went by me at the airport, but it was an hour and a half before being picked up. Then, before getting to the hotel, the driver stopped at the Dolphin Mall to pick up his friend! Crazy, but true. The next day, I made a 4pm reservation for the shuttle back to the airport. I inquired for the shuttle to the mall, and Stefanie at the front desk kept replying 'I have to check with the driver' over and over because the shuttle doesn't regularly go to the mall every hour. So, 15 minutes before 11am, the driver was going to the mall, but we didn't have our bags packed in time for that so I asked if he could go at noon. 'I have to check with the driver'. So, noon comes around (I'm waiting in the lobby for him) and he says he has to go directly to the airport. So I asked why he couldn't drop us off at the mall before the airport? No direct answer for that 'He has to go to the airport'. The next shuttle to the mall goes at 1pm. This wouldn't give us enough time to do what we needed if we were going to get our airport shuttle at 4pm of course. My husband wasn't at all happy, explained all that happened to us the night before and how inconvenient the shuttle service was for the guests (because we weren't the only ones complaining). Stefanie didn't care. She just said the next shuttle was at 1pm. Even when my husband walked away, she rolled her eyes and gave the other Front Desk clerk a dirty look, which I saw because I was watching it all from an above atrium on the second floor. Not professional. Anyways, I went back downstairs to put our suitcases behind the desk in order to check out, and explained the situation again to Shazan. He seemed to 'get it'. He was very nice about it and then offered to take me and my husband to the mall himself in his own car. Extremely nice of him! So, thats what we did. Thanks again to Shazan. Maybe he had more experience in the Hospitality Industry than his co-worker Stefanie. Shazan told us where and when to meet the shuttle for a 3pm transfer back to the hotel, and not to call. We had a great time at the mall, and 3pm came around so we waited by the hotel shuttle service station 5 min early so we wouldn't miss our pickup. 3pm came, 3:10 came... 3:20 came. We called the hotel, which said the driver had left the hotel already. 3:25 came, and there was the shuttle. So, a half hour gone waiting around, and its only a ten minute drive from the hotel to the Dolphin Mall. Basically, the shuttle service is terrible. You wait and wait, even when you call, you wait and wait. It seems like the driver decides when to go and where to stop and pick people up. I would only stay at this hotel again if I had my own car with me, or if the shuttle service vastly improved. If you are looking for an overnight hotel for a flight out, stay at a closer location. This hotel is too far out and too unpredictable with their shuttle service for a quick overnight stay.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel with an Airport Shuttle”
Reviews.Author: frankhurtte
Reviews.Content: First of all, this hotel is not "right outside the airport" in Miami. I found myself by accident - but enjoyed the stay. They have an airport shuttle that picks up pretty reguarly but only makes trips to the airport on the hour starting at 7. If you have a flight out earlier, you may be required to take a cab - and that would be very expensive as the hotel is 10 miles (or so from the airport). Once at the hotel the rooms were suite style rooms - nothing fancy but very comfortable and plenty of space. They offer a complimentary breakfast with hot foods. Actually, Hamptons are one of the best with pre-made omlets, bacon, hard boiled eggs, plus pastries and cerials. The service here was outstanding - and the van driver was one of the best in the business.

Reviews.Title: “I'd stay elsewhere next time”
Reviews.Author: Roxy-Popsy
Reviews.Content: Chose this hotel because if the positive reviews. Stayed 1 night before late evening flight out the following day. Easy to find coming from the south & plenty of free parking which was a good start. Checked in with confirmed reservation & receptionist said the computer said that the type of room we'd requested wasn't available. Very annoyed as I booked it several weeks previously. I'd requested a higher floor but we weren't allocated this either so we were woken by the noise of the traffic the following morning. Lifts V E R Y slow, & in the morning taken up with cleaning staff & their carts so anyone with cases or large packages had to wait a very long time. In the evening we sat in the bar area for a couple of drinks & a quiet read which was interupted by 3 older children shouting & screaming & dive bombing into the pool & without adult supervsion. There was a notice saying children had to be supervised at all times. Since the bar tender didn't say anything to them, or, if 'not his job' didn't bring it to the attention of a relevant member of staff, I finally snapped when I of them soaked me. I complained to a receptionist who went to the room where they were staying & spoke with the adults. We didn't return to the pool for fear of reprisals. Our 1 bedroomed suite had faulty a/c units so we spent ages going back & forth to reception trying to get it rectified but, to no avail. A staff member came to fix it, a shuttle bus driver who didn't speak English & so gesticulated on what to do with the air con controls. After he tried to fix it, a while later when I checked on our room, the temp was 14 degrees centigrade. Spent the night with the one in our bedroom turned off & the one in the sitting area on but even so it was noisy. Took the free shuttle to Dolphin Mall which was useful, just didn't want to stay on the premises longer than necessary. At check in we'd requested late check out as our flight wasn't until the evening but the staff member had said no. After all the hassle, when I complained to a senior staff member in the morning, she said late check out would be accommodated FOC & also returned our money. We appreciated this but would rather have had a positve stay.

Reviews.Title: “There's just something about this property I do not like...”
Reviews.Author: CCTVTrainer
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the property twice on business a few months apart. The first stay my allergies just started bothering me like crazy, eyes stinging, burning, etc. As soon as I leave the room, no issues so it had to be something in the room. Beyong that, elevators are slow.....when I say slow I mean always take the stairs slow! Akward location to get back on the turnpike, just a lot of little things that make to huge dissapointment. Second stay, I noticed my allergies started bothering me again so there is something in the hotel that I cannot handle, never has happend anywhere else. Elevators still slow as ever, not in a convenient place. I needed late check-out and the front desk associate made it an issue. I'm a Diamond member with 200 nights in 2011 and never had someone give me grief because I needed late check-out, the crazy thing about it was only an hour past normal check-out time. I will not be back.

Reviews.Title: “stay and cruise package.... Not worth it!”
Reviews.Author: jones80_98
Reviews.Content: paid for the stay and cruise package, got the stay but the contracted tour/transfer service is not dependable or professional. the cons for the hotel, loud voices early AM from the housecleaning staff, stiff beds, dirty and cramped breakfast area, poor choice in contracted transfer/tour operator. the pros for the hotel, close proximity to the mall, front desk gentlemen very courtous when informed of the situation, room and pool where very clean. I would not recommend this hotel if going on a cruise and need a room before hand. Also keep in mind if you do book the stay and cruise package you will have to make arrangements back to the hotel yourself 50.00 for a taxi from the port. If you just ned a place to stay to go shopping at the mall however, this would be a good place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel if shopping is your main reason”
Reviews.Author: Jam_Travel_Regular
Reviews.Content: The good: Shuttle to airport and sites in a 5 mile radius Free hot breakfast included in rate - plentiful and varied Quick check in Free wi-fi - worked well Good restaurant across the road Excellent location for shopping The bad/not so good: Shuttle was extremely slow. Tip - use it to go to airport. Be prepared to wait up to an hour if call for pick up from airport or area site Housekeeping not very well done. My room had an empty bottle from the last occupant which was behind the bedside table. I tested it and for the 3 days I stayed it was never moved from its position.

Reviews.Title: “Thought it would be closer”
Reviews.Author: TipsyTess
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel 2 nights before we left on a cruise out of Miami. They do have a free shuttle from the airport but not to the Port of Miami. I would recommand if someone is going to the port to take the free shuttle to the airport then take a taxi to the port as only $26.00. We paid a lot more. We arrived on the Friday night and tired but hungry. There was only 1 place to eat across the street. Was ok food. We had already booked a car before we left home but when we phoned the day we wanted it, they said the hotel was to far away so front desk got us another place closer. The room to the hotel was big and clean. Ate outside by the pool at breakfast which was not bad food, 2nd day was better. and after we went for a swim, even though there was scum on top. We did get out when my friend noticed a cockroach on the stairs of the pool. I did see 2 men cleanning the pool about a hour later. Maybe they should clean the pool first thing in the morning before guests start out for the day. We will not stay here again as to far out.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: trinitraveler50
Reviews.Content: Decided to book this hotel for our last two nights in Miami, as we wanted to do some shopping at the Dolphin Mall. This decision was based solely on the reviews on TA and I must say we were not disappointed. Check in was quick and easy. We had a 1 BR king suite on the 5th floor. The room was clean and spacious with a small eating area and kitchenette. Internet worked well. I had no problem with the delivery of my packages (12 of them) and the staff were super friendly. Special mention must be made of Marjorie, Adriana and Shazard at the front desk and Gilbert in the bar. They made us feel very welcome and were always willing to assist. We used the shuttle twice to Dolphin Mall. We were not impressed with Manuel the first driver as he made no effort to interact with the guests and seemed to be in a bad mood. The other driver, I believe his name was Pastor, was much better as he made every effort to ensure that his guests were taken care of.The elevators may need to be upgraded/serviced as they are very slow. All in all a very good stay and excellent value.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: jcm88
Reviews.Content: A nice hotel in a great location. After lots of research we choose this hotel based on reviews, price and location and it did not disappoint. We stayed for 4 nights during the NASCAR weekend in Homestead, easy access to the highway and great price for a two room suite. The staff was friendly and the room was very clean. Will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place for cruise stay over.”
Reviews.Author: Chris Duc
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel for a day before we left on a cruise out of Miami. Check-in was fast and efficent. Rooms were very clean and comfortable. There was a bedroom with a king bed and a sofa bed in the living room. There was also a kitchen with stove, fridge and microwave along with a table and chairs. The bathroom was clean and everything worked well. This hotel includes a hot breakfast buffet and airport shuttle which were great. They also have a regular shuttle to take people to Dolphin Mall and that was a bonus for us as we were planning to shop there and have supper. I would highly recommend this hotel as the price was excellent and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Another very nice Hampton inn”
Reviews.Author: Sucorodas
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in a quiet area, very clean, was construction on the main entrance but with excelent signage. rooms a perfect

Reviews.Title: “Accomadated a large group with no hassle”
Reviews.Author: askjck
Reviews.Content: There were 49 of us staying here. Sara was wonderful in giving us advice on where to eat and transportation. The staff was great! Breakfast was good. It saved us all eating out. My only suggestion would be to clean the pool. The kids were fine, but the adults had no interest with all of the things floating in it. Great Cuban restaurant next door.

Reviews.Title: “Stayed Twice Both Times Good Experience”
Reviews.Author: Moonpalacehater
Reviews.Content: Hotel was great. This is not the aiport hotel, but we chose it due to the price and reviews here on trip advisor. It is new, and clean. Becuase is is not the airport hotel, be prepared for a 30 minute or so wait from the time you call for the shuttle. Airport Shuttles leave for the airport every hour on the hour. There is a big difference between a hotel-restaurant, and a hotel located next to a restaranty. This is located next to a Cuban Restaurant Las Vegas, which is a 30 second walk across a parking lot. We ate there once and had them deliver the food to the front desk the second time. Both were great. Staff was friendly and surprisingly between the pool, bar, and computer rooms there is quite a bit to do there. Breakfast was great. Overall,

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Kingstown, Saint George, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Angus M
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this Hotel from July 25-29, the stay was excellent!! Clean fresh, soft bed, nice kitchenette, clean towels everyday, two conveniently place HD TV and AC units. My only problem was the shower, I was not getting warm enough water to bathe. I am from St.Vincent and the Grenadines, so nights were too cold for me!!!!!!!!!!!!! wow!! Angus Morris

Reviews.Title: “great hotel.”
Reviews.Author: mismymts1
Reviews.Content: i am writing still in the room, but we are so pleased with this hampton inn. room is spacious, immaculate and i LOVE the beds, they may be a little soft for some but i hate hard beds. the hotel service is great and everyone is very helpful. the halls are wide and lit and the breakfast is very good as well. fresh apples are provided all day, and of course free wi-fi. my favorite part of the room is the number of electrical sockets...wow, i could plug everything in and not have to move tables, beds and what ever else they use to block them. the phones, the computer and even my sound machine. i would definitely stay again. if staying here try the "las vegas cuban cuisine" next door very, very good.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel close to the airport”
Reviews.Author: R K
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, we were only at this hotel for a few hours as we checked in rather late and had to be up and out by 5am to catch a flight. With that said, the staff was very nice and helpful, the rooms were clean and were very reasonably priced. The only downfall for me was the bed. It wasn't too comfortable but I have a bad back so there are not too many beds that I get a good night sleep on anyway. So if you are thinking of staying - I would say, "Go for it!"

Reviews.Title: “Good deal - friendly, convenient (and free WiFi!)”
Reviews.Author: HotItalianSausage
Reviews.Content: Spent a night here while visiting family in the area. Very friendly staff and the hotel is clean. You get a free hot (albeit incredibly limited) breakfast (my scrambled eggs looked and tasted surprisingly like french toast sticks), but hey, what do you want for free? I'll tell you what you want for free - WiFi, and the Hampton has it! Screaming fast, too. Most hotels charge and it's so slow you may as well not have it at all. The stay was a touch on the pricey side, but this is Dade County so that's expected. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and the A/C cranks, important for Miami. One criticism, the ceiling in the room was filthy. It seems like a new hotel, so that kind of stood out. Other than that, the room was squeaky clean and had no odor at all. Check out is at noon too. That extra hour comes in handy. We will definitely stay here again the next time we visit.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for Money!”
Reviews.Author: TriniChick_30
Reviews.Content: My family and I booked at the Hampton on recommendation and were not disappointed in the least. With shopping as our main planned activity the hotel shuttle saved us considerable money, providing us with free transport to and from Dolphin Mall, International Mall, Walmart and other sites within a 5 mile radius. Be prepared to wait though- we waited as long as an hour- as there appears to be only one shuttle for all guests. Nonetheless it was very reliable and never left/ forgot us. Jamila checked us in and was quite pleasant and helpful. Staff overall was great. The business centre's printer was not working when we attempted to print our boarding passes for our flights but that was easily rectified at the airport. Breakfast was a great addition! From yoghurt to cereals to waffles and omlettes, value for money was great in this department. The hotel room was very clean and comfortable. One problem we encountered was the toilet was clogged/ not working properly but was repaired in no time once a complaint was made to the front desk. The corridors were a bit drab, but that had no real bearing on our stay. All in all, if you don't plan on renting a vehicle, or are simply looking for a good, convenient hotel to stay while in Miami, Hampton Dolphin Mall is the place.

Reviews.Title: “Will book again”
Reviews.Author: Camille B
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed at this hotel and very impressed with the amenities you get for the price... well worth it. The staff was friendly and very helpful especially front desk staff. The rooms were immaculately kept...i'm usually turned off by hotel linen but had no problems sleeping in this bed or using the towels. Shuttle was also much appreciated. I would recommend to anyone looking for a comfortable nights rest within a mile of great shopping.

Reviews.Title: “This Hotel Even Has A scale To Weigh Luggage...”
Reviews.Author: TriniTraveler4992011
Reviews.Content: I am from Trinidad & Tobago and I booked this hotel at the last minute for a shopping trip to Miami. Front desk staff and Shuttle Drivers were very pleasant. Shuttle Drivers did not speak very much English though. The hotel was very clean with a very efficient shuttle service which provided transport to and from the airport and every place within a 5 mile radius. The hotel provided breakfast, which though relatively simple, provided more than enough for the average eater (eggs, sausages, fruit, yogurt, juice, cereal, coffee, tea, hot chocolate, juice, muffins, bread, bagels, etc.). The 24 hour Business Center was also complimentary so that printing a Boarding Pass was absolutely no problem. I did not use the pool nor the Fitness Center but to me the icing on the cake was the scale to weigh luggage. Imagine going to the airport after a shopping trip knowing that one is not over weight. Thank you Hampton Inn. You've covered all bases!

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: TNtvlr
Reviews.Content: I am just finishing a one-month stay on business. This was a great location--right next to the Turnpike and away from hectic downtown or aiport, but still close. About 20 min. drive to downtown or airport (traffic permitting). Hotel is clean, quiet, comfortable room and great staff. A big shout-out to the sales manager, Sara Bravo, for giving me and a colleague each a mini-suite room at the government rate. It was great to have a kitchen/living area, especially for such a long stay. I will definitely stay here again on my next business trip to Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for your budget”
Reviews.Author: C.Mood
Reviews.Content: We just booked 1 night for our visit to Everglades next day. Room was very clean, swimming pool is shallow, good for young kids. There's a small business center with free wifi. Complementary continental breakfast is fresh and ample. Though the location is a bit far comparing to downtown, but it's just off the highway and has big mall/stores on main intersections. Very good value if you are looking for some budget hotel in south miami area.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service and hotel - stay here.”
Reviews.Author: Mark2211
Reviews.Content: The staff at this hotel are first class. Friendly, professional and welcoming. The rooms are nice for a short stay (clean, comfortable, spacious etc) and the hotel is located close to the Dolphin Shopping Mall. It provides free internet, free buffet breakfast and free transport to anywhere within a 5 mile radius of the hotel (including the airport, the mall and anywhere else you need to go!). I am generally not a fan of the Hilton chain of hotels, but I must say that I do like the Hampton. It is a comfortable, clean, and very customer friendly hotel (i.e. doesn't charge you for the most basic of things you need when you are travelling - unlike many more 'exclusive' hotels). Very well done the Hampton, and we will always stay here whenever we go shopping in Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Its so comfy it as though you never left home”
Reviews.Author: coryTrinidad
Reviews.Content: I just came back from my 12 days vacation. I went to the Bahamas for 6 days then 6 days at the Hampton Inn Doral in Miami from June 29th to July 4th. This is my first stay at this hotel and would sure love to return. On arrival at the front desk the reception attendant was quite friendly and pleasant.... I stayed in room 215, I was quite impressed by the room and the layout etc....very clean and new, the best of all the bed was perfect, not too hard or soft, pillows great too and very soft blankets and towel.....that I really appreciated If I have to say anything that was not so great was the breakfast, for those who eat eggs and waffles and love that stuff they would love the breakfast, I went with the variety of cereals and fruits. Love the shuttle service. It is a great convenience and is always on time. The area where the hotel is located was quite nice and peaceful, you have subway and other eateries and pharmacy walking distance from the hotel. Overall I love the hotel, would definitely return. Cory Trinidad

Reviews.Title: “Very nice.”
Reviews.Author: CajunKimo
Reviews.Content: I've stayed here on several different trips down to the Keys and the access to this hotel is excellent. The service was a bit slow but eventually they were very helpful when I told them that the first room they gave me had a noisy air conditioner. I had a very nice room - comfy and quiet. Never heard any noise from the Turnpike or from the airplaines flying over. Parking lot was a bit dark.

Reviews.Title: “Shuttle Service, Breakfast and Internet saved us loads of $$$”
Reviews.Author: 98Maxima
Reviews.Content: Great hotel, Great staff, great suite rooms for a great price. Undergoing renovations but as of first week of March which we stayed, the Foyer was just about done. Shuttle service to and from Airport saved us $35 each way, free inernet and breakfast was great. Shuttle to the pier with Super Shuttle for 4 adults and 2 babies ended up being $60. Taxi Ride back with 2 adults one kid was around $42. A bit further from the pier but we wanted to waste a day close to Dolphin outlet mall and the shuttle service made it worthwhile. You may have to wait up to 20 min for it was fine.

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly and professional staff, great value”
Reviews.Author: rmc76
Reviews.Content: Often stay at Hampton Inns across the country, this was one of the best. Very pleasant staff with excellent customer service skills - hard to find these days! Clean, quiet rooms, good amenities in a decent location - near the airport, although there isn't much of interest (food or drink) within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent room for the price”
Reviews.Author: Tsar_Bomba
Reviews.Content: We stayed here on the backend of a cruise...basically to waste a day before our flight. When we stayed there (Jan '11) they were undergoing renovations. There is a good and a bad side to this: The good side is that our room was finished and was very nice (see below). The bad side is that if we been there during the week...there would have been construction noise. Even on the weekend there was some. The room, for the price, was fantastic. Everything was new and quite big. They seemed to have all the little extras that make you feel like you got a really good deal (hand creams, a couch, different styles of pillows, fancy dark wood....stuff like that). I don't know if this is a chain-wide thing, or just this hotel, but they seem to be putting a lot of effort into making you feel at home. The guy taking care of the free breakfast buffet was very friendly...as was all the front counter staff we dealt with. The (outdoor) hotel bar seemed more like a local hangout, at least on the night we were there. We felt like we were hanging out in the corner while the bartender partied with all his friends. He was nice enough...but it wasn't what i'd call a relaxing place. One negative to this hotel is that it is not really near anything. If you're like us and didn't have a car, they do provide a free shuttle able to take you to the airport and a few malls/attrractions. One problem we had with this shuttle is that there is only one...so you're at its mercy as to what time you leave and/or are picked up. We had to wait for well over an hour at one of the malls for it to get us. The drivers we dealt with were't particularly friendly either....at least it was free.

Reviews.Title: “Under construction”
Reviews.Author: Chris3081
Reviews.Content: Paid WAY too much for a hotel that was under construction--literally. Tore apart and being reconstructed. Tne good news was the breaksfast and beds were typically Hamption. Got a cheap ride to dock >$13--there were 11 of us. Shuttle to motel was free and easy at 9 pm.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location for shopping!”
Reviews.Author: csa2010
Reviews.Content: The price was an attraction, then value for money after reading about amenities and after reading the reviews, we booked! The main purpose of our trip was for shopping. So that means we were looking for the best deal, but of course somewhere safe and comfortable. Complimentary shuttle service to Dolphin Mall, Miami International Mall & there is a Walmart close by, Airport pick up and drop off, free internet, and breakfast included. Breakfast is more or less the same every day but a wide variety so you can mix it up each day. Service was excellent especially Claudia (front desk), Miguel (shuttle driver), and Miguelina (house-keeping) - you guys were great! The room was average, beds very comfy. Cleanliness was good. What I liked best - location Least - that I had to leave There is also a Navarros, Cuban Restaraunt and couple other eating places right next door! I'm sure to return.

Reviews.Title: “Good base for Race Weekend at Homestead.”
Reviews.Author: BMTSatelliteBeach_Fl
Reviews.Content: Stayed on Saturday night after the Nationwide Race at the Homestead Speedway(28 miles) This was a Honors stay so can't comment on the cost on Race Weekend. Hotel very clean staff very nice,on line it said under construction,saw no sign of this. Only minor complaint would be it's close to the turnpike so you do hear a little trafic nosie, no real problem. will be staying there again next year for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay before cruise - amazing staff, timely shuttle, good bang for the buck”
Reviews.Author: jewels89
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Miami for a few days before our cruise, and ended up staying here through recommendation from other friends. Free shuttle brings you to the malls and the airport - the driver was a sweetie and we always had service with a smile. It's a bit of a distance to get down to Miami/South Beach, but the shuttle makes it easier of course for bus connections and such. Considering the prices of hotels down in the downtown area, we figured this was a much better choice. Hotel itself was very nice. Rooms were nothing amazing, but were what would expect from a good hotel. Beds were comfortable, pillows were big and poofy. We had problems with the wireless the second and third night, but there's a free business centre downstairs with computers, so that wasn't a big issue. Hotel staff were friendly and helpful as well. We'll def stay here again next time we're in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay”
Reviews.Author: spemby
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed there reccently. It was a great experience. First the entire staff was very friendly and helpful. The shuttle service is prompt, the breakfast while somewhat limited was delicious and satisfying. The bar was cozy for after hours drinks. The rooms were clean and comfortable. Even when we left our camera on the bench outside, we were able to get it back as someone dropped it back to the receptionist. Overall it was a really wonderful place to stay and you really get value. We will deffinitely be staying there on our next shopping trip!

Reviews.Title: “Location, value and service with a smile. A very enjoyable stay.”
Reviews.Author: tripholic
Reviews.Content: Right off the turnpike but still quiet. Location was the main reason for choice. Front desk crew is amazing(everybody). Very clean hotel from rooms to overall property. Nice pool and workout room. The breakfast was the only downside to my stay. I do not think those were eggs. Oh well, the fruit and yogurt was better for me. At least the coffee was free all day, and they have a 24hr pantry. Very, very affordable for Doral, which is a great place to stay for business in Miami or Ft Lauderdale. I had a full kitchen and it came in handy, a Whole market is close, and I was able to entertain colleagues in my room.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Yonguk_traveller
Reviews.Content: Not much more to add than the rest of the reviews, other than to back them up and say that the Hampton Inn was a great find for a trip to Miami, especially for shopping and proximity to the airport. Strongly recommend hiring a car.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel of 5 stats with the price of 2”
Reviews.Author: arenal-azul
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel prior our cruise trip, we wanted to go shopping before the cruise, I am glad we found this hotel. This is a good hotel and the value has a good price. Gym, free breakfast, Internet and much more. The service was excellent. They make you feel like you are at home. The breakfast was great. I really liked the complimentary pick up to and from the airport. What I liked the most was the free shuttle that they provide to the malls, supermarket and restaurants in the area and the staff. Roberto and Manuel were great drivers, and the two girls at the reception were great very nice and helpful . It is located near good restaurants and shopping, but if you want to go to another place they will take and also they will go to pick you up. The rooms, shower, towels, very clean. Next time I am in Miami, I will stay there again. Thank you Staff!

Reviews.Title: “Stress Free Holiday & Great Shopping”
Reviews.Author: BarbadosMissy
Reviews.Content: This Hampton Inn was good value for money. The hotel offers a hot breakfast that was varied and more than adequate. We spent a week and did not have the same menu twice. The service was excellent...Vicky at Front Office was exceptional and staff were helpful and friendly. Rooms were immaculate and the beds were absolutely wonderful. If you're on business, there's a work desk and executive chair accompanied by desklamp. If you want to work from the comfort of your bed, try the laptop stand provided. Rooms have internet access or you may just want to use the complimentary business centre in the lobby. The hotel offers a very efficient shuttle service...airport pickup was quick and once you let Reception know where you want to go, the shuttle will take you anywhere within a five mile radius. For shopping buffs, you will want to visit Dolphin Mall, Miami International Mall or the nearby Walmart and dining options all compliments of the shuttle. Restaurants within walking distance are Subway, McDonalds and Denny's. However, my recommendation is the cuban restaurant Las Vegas which is literally a minute's walk from the hotel lobby. Food and service is great there and it's fine dining at a reasonable price...even entertainment on some nights. For a relaxing vacation with the benefits of some good shopping....it's this Hampton Inn!

Reviews.Title: “Clean rooms, pleasant and helpful staff, an overall great experience”
Reviews.Author: hospe_chick
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent two nights with our two sons aged 5 and almost 2. The king bed suite was the perfect size for us. The kids slept on the sofa bed. The room was clean and the kitchenette had all the conveniences that we needed. The breakfast was okay for a courtesy spread. But I have to commend that staff everyone was friendly and accommodating from the gentleman manning the breakfast area to the reception personnel. We will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “What a great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: JDTravelCanada
Reviews.Content: This hotel is great! We stayed here a few days after a cruise in March. We were all very pleased with our choice. They have a shuttle that will drive/pick-up you pretty much anywhere. The front desk staff is awesome and always greet you with a smile. Hotel has good size pool, exercise room and free internet in rooms and all over the hotel including outside by the pool. The Breakfast is everything you need to start the day and if your in a hurry they have breakfast to go. Lots of places nearby to eat or pickup things you need. They are very close to one of the nicest malls we have ever been in. If your looking for a Miami Beach hotel then this is not it. However it does have everything you need and only a few miles to the Airport.

Reviews.Title: “Terrific Staff”
Reviews.Author: harveylipshitz
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this Hampton Inn a couple of weeks ago for one night before catching our cruise the next day. I thought the front desk was a little understaffed at times and the "free" breakfast is nothing to write mom about but other than that this place is nice. Free Airport shuttle was prompt, hotel and my room were very clean, and the whole staff was very pleasant to deal with. The front desk staff were exceptional and were very helpful in getting shuttles to supper, the mall and to the pier on Monday. If I were to ever stay in Miami again this Hampton would be the first place I would call.

Reviews.Title: “A Suprisingly Low Quality Hampton”
Reviews.Author: Bittco
Reviews.Content: First off if going to the Miami airport this is a pretty good spot. The front desk was also very nice. That is all the good I really have to say- I actually decided to check out early I didn't like this place. First off my room smelled like puke. I could even tell it was coming from right next to my bed. Secondly the bathrooms were not totally clean. Thirdly the morning breakfest was limited for a Hampton and very very crowded. All-in-all this was a poor hampton inn experience.

Reviews.Title: “Always Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: MikeandAnn
Reviews.Content: This was a great stop for a few nights in Miami. As ever , comfortable rooms and great beds never let you down. Slightly out of town but handy for shopping malls and miami sights. If you are not looking for beach holiday this place is hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: “Very decent hotel for a short stopover!”
Reviews.Author: lanneNL
Reviews.Content: I stayed for 1 night in this hotel, after arriving at Miami International. While waiting on my luggage to arrive, I called the hotel from the hotel reservations stand in the arrivals hall. The shuttle was send to fetch me, and since the lady at the front desk had heard my name already, after arriving with the shuttle the check-in was very smooth and quick! Room was good, clean, very fine king bed (slept great), clean bathroom with amenities and nothing to complain about. Breakfest was good for a hotel like this, but not comparable to what you get in a holiday hotel. Nonetheless, there was somehting to find for everyone. Took the shuttle to the Dolphin Mall (about 5 minute drive), and back, wothout a problem. There is an outside pool at the hotel, with a bar and small terrace. Didn't use the pool msyelf though, but it looked like a good way for refreshing if I would have stayed longer. There were some restaurants next to the hotel. There was free Wifi allover the hotel, as well as a business room with 2 computers and printer and tourist information folders downstairs. Friendly and helpfull staff! Overall it was a good hotel for the purpose (staying over in Miami), without going really back to basic! I wouldn't go there for a longer holiday, but for a few days it is great. Close to some attractions as well, especially if you have a car. Would go there again for a stopover in Miami!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for a business traveler in Doral”
Reviews.Author: JuanMascaro
Reviews.Content: Overall, well worth the price for my 3 day stay at the Hampton Inn Suite at Doral it was a very pleasant experience. The guestroom was very comfortable and clean, most important the bed and pillow were awesome. The amenities offered by the hotel aims to anticipate business travelers needs. Lastly, the hotel receptionist at the front desk was very accommodating and the entire staff was cordial.

Reviews.Title: “Reliable, Good Location & Great Service”
Reviews.Author: luis-aleman
Reviews.Content: Great hotel for work related trips. Includes all the amenities needed. Even though it doesnÂ´t have a restaurant, it has a bar and grill that works. Has a good location, with restaurants (shuttle), malls & ONLY 2 minutes from the airport (shuttle transportation available)

Reviews.Title: “Nice, comfy beds...”
Reviews.Author: FlyingSuperMonkey
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for a night on the way to our vacation destination. The front desk clerk was really nice and helpful. The Continental Breakfast was good, and I loved the pillows. I never figured out what was up with the ceiling as it almost looked like there had been a fire and they touched one area up with a bright white paint instead of ceiling paint. It looks really far fromt the airport, but you're there in no time on the shuttle.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel at a very competivie rate.”
Reviews.Author: Surenjj
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel on our way to a cruise. We stayed for two days before the cruise and for about three days after. The hotel provides free shuttle to the airport and to major shopping centres in the area. Breakfast was free and adequate and unlimited coffee and fruits 24 hrs a day. Hotel is very clean and the pool area in nice although we did not have time to use it. I find the staffs very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Happy at Hamptons”
Reviews.Author: Tourist59
Reviews.Content: Stayed for one night after a long late flight. Easy to find after collecting car at Budget Car Hire (Dolphin Expressway and Florida Turnpike ) The staff at reception were very pleasant and we were in our room within 5 minutes of arriving. Had a burger and chip in Tiki Bar. This was perfect as we did not want to travel again that night. Breakfast the next morning was excellent (part of the price). We paid $111 for 4 people and I thought this was excellent. Considering I booked about 6 months previously I was most impressed when they honored a price reduction which came into effect in May 08. (I email them when i noticed a lower price on other websites AND THEIR OWN) Would definitely stay again if looking for a stop over hotel

Reviews.Title: “No Thanks”
Reviews.Author: havingfun42
Reviews.Content: Room was on the 1st floor near the lobby, very loud in the morning once breakfast started at 6 am. The 1st night went to take a shower and there was something yellow and greasy in the tub. Called the front desk and 30 minutes later a maid showed up and cleaned the tub. Tub was still very slippery and difficult to stand in, felt awful on your feet. The bathroom was very dark, had to apply my make-up out in the room. We were travelling with another couple, went to the pool there were 3 lounge chairs. Seems ridiculous for a hotel pool. Beds were comfortable, breakfast was average. Desk staff was very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel friendly service.”
Reviews.Author: Traveler8989
Reviews.Content: My husband and I, along with my two adult children, came early to Miami before our cruise and stayed at this hotel for 2 nights. We did not want to live too close to the airport, and the location of this hotel was perfect. There were many restaurants and two major malls within short driving distance. The front desk person was very helpful in directing us to a nearby cuban restaurant that served delicious Cuban food. Would definately recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it!”
Reviews.Author: MonikaToronto_Canada
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for one night prior to going on a cruise. We chose this hotel for a number of reasons, it's free airport shuttle, the free breakfast & the close proximity to the huge Dolphin Mall....as I was travelling with 2 teenagers, this gave us something to do the night before, lots of great shopping, dining & entertainment options there. We were picked up at the airport within 20 minutes of my calling, by a very friendly & informative shuttle driver, Juan. Juan also later drove us to the mall & came back and picked us up again when we were done....I was very impressed by this, as it's not something that the hotel advertises, just a simple courtesy that saved me money on taxi's...Juan even stopped for us so we could take pictures....this went a long way for us! All of the hotel staff were friendly and helpful, right from the moment we checked-in....they even arranged our transportation the next day to the cruise terminal. Everyone seemed genuinely happy to be working there, as there was always a smile and a warm hello from the staff. The rooms were clean and very comfortable, we all slept great. A big plus was the free breakfast the next day, especially with my 2 very hungry kids...everything was delicious and fresh. The free internet was also a plus. Overall this hotel was a very pleasant place to stay, a great value for the money. I highly recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel That Lived Up to the Hampton Name”
Reviews.Author: RaceTraveler
Reviews.Content: It truly was a pleasure to stay at this hotel. Staff was friendly and accomodating; hotel and hotel premises were clean. We had a second story double room that was spacious, quiet, and private. Internet hookup (although not wireless, at least in my room) was adequate - they provided an ethernet cable in the room. Breakfast was nice, with a higher than average selection of food compared to other Hamptons. Parking was a bit tight, but nothing to complain about. In the lobby, you will find a convienient business center that allowed me to print my airplane boarding passes (at no cost) the day before I departed. The architecture was nice as well - for a 2 star hotel anyway. In regards to the reviewer that noted the loud music and partying in the downstairs bar, I was fortunate enough to avoid this experience. While there were some people down there at night, they were absolutely no bother to me at all. Perhaps his/her experience was an isolated incident. (I wanted to comment on this, as it was a concern for me, especially during a weekend in which the hotel was to be full.) For the race fans out there: We stayed at this hotel for the Homestead NASCAR race weekend, November 2006. Looking for something that was along Florida's Turnpike, this seemed to be in a decent location. About a 25-30 minute drive to the speedway - at the time, it was the best we could find.

Reviews.Title: “Overrated but still a good choice”
Reviews.Author: shelter
Reviews.Content: We stayed here July 21st for one night. The room was decent but could have been larger and cleaner (dust on wall-to-wall carpet in the room, stains in the corridor, one Q-tip behind a piece of furniture). People had a picnic on the tables near the pool on the evening and nothing was cleaned up in the morning so it made a bad impression looking outside. But the staff was pleasant and the breakfast really very good with a lot of choice and delicious cakes. The location is good if you just stop here to sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location,Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: Guest06
Reviews.Content: I recently stay at the Hampton Inn at the Doral area, right off the Florida Turnpike, and I have stayed at a few Hampton's before and they all good, I beleived this one was Great!, the staff was great, the rooms- I stayed in a suite that had a kitchen, was very clean and the bar was a good thing to have. My business is around this area, I will stay there whenever I have to go to Miami to work.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel Chain”
Reviews.Author: Iskan
Reviews.Content: This is the last of 5 hotels my family and I stayed in during our 2 week trip to Florida and we were very impressed with the standards of this chain of hotels. We tried to get in the other Hampton Inn that was nearer the airport but it was full. However, this place was fine. Exceptional levels of cleanliness, the staff were brilliant and extremely helpful, even though we only stayed for the one night. Out of the five hotels, this had by far the most comprehensive breakfast which was very well presented and not laced in sugar! They also had free internet access on 2 PC's which kept my kids quiet all morning as we waited in their lobby. You have to vacate your room by 11am and we did not need to leave for the airport until 1pm. They very kindly let us stay in their comfortable reception area and even provided free coffee! We had a twin bedded room which only cost $157 for the night which was very reasonable indeed. We can highly recommend this hotel and if we go to the States in the future, I am going to seriously look at staying at this chain of hotels - they have put a lot of thought into them as to what a customer wants... PS There is a Tony Romas just up the road as well!

Reviews.Title: “Clean Room & Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: cowboys
Reviews.Content: Our family stayed here for 3 nights in March and found the staff really helpful and the room was clean. We used the shuttle to the airport and really enjoyed talking to the driver. We also appreciated the availabiltiy of a washer/dryer as we used them before heading off on our cruise. Only one small complaint was I found the one bedroom suite to be a bit cluttered with too much furniture. Anyways the room was clean and would definitely recommend it. If your planning to stay here before a cruise, the taxi to the port was $46.

Reviews.Title: “Good deal”
Reviews.Author: 1pickymommy
Reviews.Content: Customer service was great... definitely a good hotel for the price... if you are used to a Westin, W or something along that lines, this is not for you. Good basic hotel. Clean, a little on the older side, but free shuttle, breakfast, and workout room!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: charck
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at many Hampton Inns around the country and found this location to be one of the better ones. Basically, everything you would expect from a Hampton Inn plus more. I am a bit biased though, because I feel that Hampton Inn is the absolute best chain in the mid/high-budget category. Higher end chains generally do not offer free hot breakfast, wireless internet, and parking (even at airport locations). I appreciated some of the extras offered at this location, which are not always present at other Hampton Inns, such as the cookies at reception and a nicely-sized business/computer center. There was even a tiki-bar at the pool that served food. Internet worked fine in the room and the bedding looked new, was comfortable, and there were many nice pillows. I have also stayed at the Hampton Inn Miami Airport/Blue Lagoon which is highly ranked at this site and generally charges higher rates. This Hampton Inn Miami West, to me, seemed to be just as good as the Airport/Blue Lagoon location. I believe both have a free airport shuttle. I will certainly stay at this location again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The staff was very courteous and helpful. However, we reserved a double smoking room and received a nonsmoking suite because the hotel was supposedly booked up. It was nice to be upgraded to a suite but the shower was designed for handicapped individuals which made it difficult to take showers without getting water all over the bathroom floor. It was great to have the extra space though. Our room was facing the poolside bar and we didn't have problems with any noise coming from the bar. The bartender makes great apple martinis! Also, they have breakfast each morning with eggs, sausage, bagels, pastries, etc. Overall the hotel is very nice with clean rooms. I would highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This hotel is perfect! Great rates, We paid $89.00 a night, we booked a room with two beds and they upgrade us because we belong to the Hilton frequent stay program...they did with out us having to ask! Great suite(and very clean) with full kitchen,which is great if you have kids. They have a pool, very clean and next to the pool there's a tiki bar! Not usual for Hampton's but it's a plus! to have drinks while the kids are on the pool. The lobby is real nice, they have a huge aquarium, kids loved it! The front desk was very helpful and they gave my kids a puppet to play and keep! I will stay there again and highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: “Pretty good”
Reviews.Author: moodyblue
Reviews.Content: I just completed a four night stay at this Hampton which began one day after the other review of this place was posted. By and large, I agree with their comments - this place is all around pretty nice and good value for the dollar. I do have some other points I'd like to address. The previous reviewer mentioned the outdoor bar area. That isn't a bad deal (I don't drink) but I would caution people having a room facing the pool area - even with the windows closed and the air conditioning running, I did hear too much noise coming from this area. If you are a light sleeper/go to bed early/or simply don't like the noise, you should definately try and get a room not facing the pool. The previous reviewer also mentioned being right next to the FL turnpike. That is convenient, but be advised I found it rather difficult/risky exiting the parking lot in the morninig rush hour and trying to reenter it in the afternoon. One final note - I personally evaluated hotels (both high end and low end) on how they execute the small things. It did bother me that several days I didn't receive a newspaper and that as a Platinum member of the Hilton Honors program I didn't receive any recognition for that status. Small stuff to be sure, but that was factored into why I didn't give it an excellent rating.

HotelInfo.Name: Hampton Inn & Suites Miami-Doral/Dolphin Mall
HotelInfo.Address: 11600 NW 41st St, Miami, FL 33178
